## Copy improvements

### Main client authorization page (`/invite/[token]/page.tsx`)
- Header: "Grant {agency} access to your accounts" (was: "needs access to your advertising accounts")
- Subheader: "Connect X platforms in about 5 minutes" (was: "Authorize X platforms to complete the onboarding process")
- Intake form: "Quick Setup" (was: "Additional Information")
- Progress labels: "Setup", "Connect", "Done" (was: "Intake", "Connect Platforms", "Complete")
- Security notice: "Official OAuth only. We never see or store your passwords." (was: longer explanation)
- Success: "All set" (was: "You're All Set!")
- Error: "Link expired" (was: "Link Expired or Invalid")

### PlatformAuthWizard component
- Step 1 (Connect): "Sign in to {platform} and approve access. You'll choose which accounts to share next." (was: longer explanation)
- Step 2 (Select): "Choose accounts to share" (was: "Select {platform} Assets")
- Step 3 (Success): "Connected" and "Access granted to the accounts you selected." (was: "Successfully Connected!" with longer text)
- Button: "Confirm selection" (was: "Confirm Access for {platform}")
- Step labels: "Connect", "Choose", "Done" (was: "Connect", "Select Assets", "Connected")

### Asset selector components
- Loading: "Loading your accounts" (was: "Loading your {platform} assets...")
- Error: "Couldn't load accounts" (was: "Failed to Load Assets")
- Selection summary: "Selected" and "Accounts you're sharing" (was: "Assets Selected" and "Choose which assets to share with the agency")
- Empty state: "No {type} available" (was: "No {type} found")

### PlatformWizardCard
- Subtitle: "Connect {platform}" (was: "Connect your {platform} account")

## Principles applied
1. Brevity: Cut 40‚Äì60% of unnecessary words
2. Directness: Removed corporate padding and hedging
3. Clarity: Lead with what matters most
4. User focus: Benefits over features
5. Consistency: Unified tone across all pages

All changes maintain functionality while making the copy clearer and more direct.

## Changes Made

1. Removed header sections:
   - Removed the main header ("Grant {agency} access to your accounts" and "Connect X platforms in about 5 minutes")
   - Removed the platforms step header ("Connect your accounts" and "Choose which accounts to share")

2. Added top-level progress indicator:
   - Progress summary: "X of Y platforms connected" with percentage
   - Visual progress bar: fills as platforms are completed
   - Platform checklist: shows each platform with:
     - Checkmark when completed (green)
     - Current platform highlighted (bold, dark)
     - Upcoming platforms (gray)
   - Responsive: wraps on smaller screens

The progress indicator appears at the top of the platforms step, giving users a clear view of overall progress and remaining work without redundant headers.
